title: As a user I want to view the National ID section of an existing Grandfathered profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC and Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an existing Grandfathered profile
custom_expected:
THEN system will display the National ID section per the Data Discovery and provided wireframe.  (the far right column in the data discovery indicates which fields are not included for Grandfathered profiles)

*Note that grandfathered profiles are international amateurs with a DOB before 9/1/1995*

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347752

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=grandfathered_-_hidden_profile

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to change a grandfathered player's DOB to that of a player subject to registration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC and Club user logs with edit permission for Grandfathered profile
AND user opens an existing Grandfathered profile in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user attempting  to change a grandfathered player's date of birth to a date equal to or after 9/1/1995
custom_expected:
THEN system will throw a hard error. 
AND Message #15 should display on save.

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347695

Messages #15: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a user I want the system to calculate the Meets Age Requirements On date for a new Registration profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND user is in create a new player profile form
custom_steps: WHEN a user click "Next" or "Register" from the Create New form
custom_expected:
THEN the system should calculate the Meets Age Requirement date per the provided business rules. 
AND This date should also be recalculated on any save in case of changes to the DOB during the create process. 
AND This field is not editable by users.

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Requirement

title: As a BOC user I want to view the National ID section of an existing Registration profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is logged in with a Viewer Permissions for Registration profile
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an existing Registration profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system will display the National ID section per the Data Discovery and provided wireframe. 

*Note that registration profiles are international amateurs with a DOB on or after 9/1/1995*

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347752

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master

title: As a user I want the system to determine whether the player I'm creating a profile for is subject to registration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC or Club user is logged in with Create Permissions for Registration Profile
AND user is navigate to the International Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN the system will load the "Create New" form where the user can begin the process of creating a new International Amateur profile.
AND This form matches the provided wireframe.
AND Entering a date of birth with prompt the system to determine if the player the user is creating a profile for is subject to registration or not (using the provided rules). 
AND If the player is subject to registration, then the note "Subject to L1 Reg" appears next to the DOB field. The "Next" button will also be replaced with a "Register" button.  
OR If the player is not subject to registration, then the note "Not Subject to L1 Reg" appears next to the DOB fields. The "Next" button remains a "Next" button. 
AND Any time the user changes the DOB on the form, the system will need to re-check the profile type and make the appropriate updates.
AND Selecting a "Country of Residence" will pre-populate the Birth Country field with the same value. 
AND The Birth Country will remain editable, and updating the Birth Country field will NOT change the Country of Residence.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=grandfathered
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Requirement

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to change a registration player's DOB to that of a player not subject to registration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC and Club user logs with edit permission for registration player profile
AND user opens an existing registration player profile in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN Attempting to change a registration player's date of birth to a date before 9/1/1995
custom_expected:
THEN the system should throw a hard error. 
AND Message #14 should display on save.

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347695

Messages #14: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a user I want to see an error if I attempt to register a player younger than 14 years of age
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC and Club user logs with register permission for International player
custom_steps: WHEN user create an international amateur player profile for a player that is not at least 14 years old (based on current date)
custom_expected:
THEN the system should throw should a hard error.  
AND Message #1 should display on "Save" from the profile or "Register" from the Create New.

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347695

Messages #1: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a user I want to be able to delete a trainer/agent profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with delete permissions for trainer/agent profiles 
AND user navigates to L1 Reg tab under International
AND user select a trainer/agent from the widget and opens the trainer/agent profile in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN System will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the profile.
AND If they confirm, then the status is updated to "Deleted", and the trainer/agent profile no longer appears as an option on registration profiles, or in the trainer/agents widget. 
AND A blue notification is thrown confirming the deletion

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=trainer_agent_profile

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new Trainer/Agent profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with edit permissions for trainer/agent profiles
AND user navigates to L1 Reg tab under International
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Create New" button on the Trainer/Agent widget
custom_expected:
THEN System will loads a blank trainer/agent profile for the user, per the wire and data discovery. 
AND When on the trainer/agent form there is a save button and a cancel button available. 
AND Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they are OK losing their changes. If they confirm, the system will discard the profile and return the user to the point of entry. If they do not confirm, they are returned to the profile in edit mode. 
OR Clicking "Save" will run a required field and format check for the profile and save the profile. 
AND The profile will be assigned a status of "Approved" and be visible in the trainer/agent widget, as well as the International Trainer search.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_a_new_trainer_agent

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347878

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to view the Trainer/Agent profile associated with a registration profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logged in with Viewer permissions for Registration profile and Trainer/Agent profile
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an existing Registration profile
custom_expected:
THEN  the Trainer/Agent name is a hyperlink. 
AND Clicking on the hyperlink will navigate the user to the associated trainer/agent profile.
Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to create a new Trainer/Agent while editing a registration profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logged in with create permissions for Registration profile and Trainer/Agent profile
AND user is in edit mode on a registration profile as a BOC user
AND user navigated to a "New Trainer/Agent" hyperlink in the Trainer/Agent section of the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "New Trainer/Agent" link (Club users do not see this hyperlink)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will open a new trainer/agent form in a new tab/window for the user to complete the profile. 
AND Clicking "Save" on the new trainer/agent form will store the trainer/agent profile as an Approved profile, just as though it were created through the normal "Create New" workflow. 
AND After the new trainer/agent has been saved - it should be prepopulated in the "Name" field of the registration profile.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_new_trainer_agent_v1

title: As a user I want to be able to view an Offseason Assignment for an employee
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Viewer permission for an Offseason Assignment for an employee
AND user Advance Search for an Offseason Assignment Transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user opes an Offseason Assignment transaction
custom_expected:
THEN If any Offseason Assignment transactions existed for employees in ebis1, we need to build the UI and ETL them to ebis2. 
AND user should see that the UI has 1 additional field (Designate As), but otherwise matches that of the player transaction. 
AND user should not be able to enter new, edit, save these transactions.

Wireframe:
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=offseason_assignment
